forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early then remaining overcast and windy late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
